Hi I got your message I am at my desk if you want to call me back

Original Message From Laurel Hazzard Sent Wednesday October AM To Matt Subject I continue to write to you but you dont write back Thats nice Anyways I heard that Skamania lodge is a cool place to stay It is in Washington but just across the river from Hood River I dont know what you think about that If you want I can contact them Ill wait to hear from you

REI just remembered something funny that happened on the bus this morning Remember the guy who I told you about the one who gets excited when I get on the bus Anyways this morning he was staring at me as usual and instead of looking away I smiled at him So when he got up to get off he asks me if I like cinnamon rolls I said no And he said I will bring you some tomorrow and then I said awesome Now I have to take the earlier bus so I wont have to see him This girl who I am friends with was sitting next to me during the interaction and it was pretty funny ok that is it Original Message From Smith Matt mailtoMatt NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Laurel Hazzard Subject RE Lets seeI worked a little on Sunday but wasnt too motivated because of all of the turmoil at the company Weather was really nice so Mark and I went to a bar thats half outside to watch some football Only thing is the one game we wanted to watch wasnt on At least there was plenty of beer Then we went home and grilled some steaks I like steak Thats about it How about you Did you get all of your laundry done I didnt Mat Original Message From Laurel Hazzard mailto Sent Monday October PM To Smith Matt Subject Hi How was the rest of your weekend I miss you Laurel This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

REWell I did get all of my laundry done I went and picked up the uniform and then went to a couple parties they were fun I has my soccer game and it sucked I think everyone on my team was hung over and we lost I went out to lunch and then to the mall I bought some new jeans Later I went out to dinner and then to Fred Meyer It was very exciting Is there day light savings time there Im glad you had fun with your friend Did you sleep in the same bed I only have a four day work week I am taking Friday off for the surgury I am not yet freaking out but I probably will later I am tired and out of it todaymoving a little slow Laurel Original Message From Smith Matt mailtoMatt NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Laurel Hazzard Subject RE Lets seeI worked a little on Sunday but wasnt too motivated How are you feeling this morning
Hi Will you send me copies of those pictures My address is NE nd Place Portland OR I really am sorry to hear about your job situation I hope it all works out I wish you were here I miss you Laurel
Happy Halloween How are you feeling this morning I know you love email correspondence so youll be sure to write back

REyes you were a little intoxicated when we spoke last night but you were sweet That is kind of creepy that it is a full moon on Halloween I need to keep my cat inside because people steal cats on Halloween and skin them Well buck up little camper in the scope of everything things really arent that bad You could have to have life altering surgury Since this thing with my family it really has put a lot of things into perspective I hope you feel better Call me later Love Laurel Original Message From Smith Matt mailtoMatt NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Laurel Hazzard Subject RE i feel a little awfulplus im tired I hope you werent looking forward to speaking with a sober Mat yesterday i dont think i was that drunk but who knows plus i must be allergic to something because i cant stop sneezing oh my life just sucks these daysjk anyway are you looking forward to tonightespecially with a nice full moonmake sure to look out for the goblins Original Message From Laurel Hazzard mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To Smith Matt Subject Happy Halloween How are you feeling this morning I know you love email correspondence so youll be sure to write back This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
